settings.name: windowWidth
settings.label: Width of the window
settings.description: The width of the window (in frames).

settings.name: intervalLength
settings.label: Interval Length
settings.description: The number of frames between each segment.

settings.name: pauseLength
settings.label: Pause length
settings.description: The length of the pause after a gesture is recognized (in frames).

settings.name: motionThreshold
settings.label: Motion threshold
settings.description: The minimum hand motion to consider that the segment may be a gesture.
